sentences.en: And tens of millions of less well - heeled consumers routinely splurge on high - end products.
sentences.cn: 那么,千百万自备消费者日常挥霍 高端 产品.

sentences.en: And the more people you're shopping with, the more your chances a splurge increase.
sentences.cn: 一起去购物的人数越多, 人们挥霍的几率会越大.

sentences.en: Billionaires swarmed into Nice to splurge millions during the summer holidays.
sentences.cn: 暑期休假时,亿万富翁们群趋尼斯挥霍了百万巨款.

sentences.en: Enjoying simple but inexpensive pleasures like nature walks and museums can quell the urge to splurge.
sentences.cn: 享受简单的廉价的快乐如简单的散步和参观博物馆就是治愈你坏毛病的良方.

sentences.en: How to control the politicians'urge to splurge?
sentences.cn: 那如何才能控制政客们挥霍无度 呢 ?

sentences.en: I had a splurge and bought two new suits.
sentences.cn: 我大手大脚花了一笔钱买了两套新衣服.

sentences.en: I'm all for it myself . We're free this afternoon . Let's really splurge.
sentences.cn: 我非常赞成喝点酒,今天下午我们都没事,我们就喝个痛快吧.

sentences.en: I'm confident that there's enough in the bank for a splurge on a great pair of shoes.
sentences.cn: 我相信，银行里存有足够的钱能让我破费一回买双好鞋。

sentences.en: Let's splurge on a fried chicken for one time.
sentences.cn: 我们就奢侈一次买只炸鸡 吧.

sentences.en: Managers may also have learned a lesson from the investment splurge of the 1990 s.
sentences.cn: 经理人们还有可能是在上世纪90年代投资烧钱热中学到了教训.

sentences.en: No work this afternoon. Let's really splurge.
sentences.cn: 下午没工作, 让我们好好地喝一顿.

sentences.en: Remember: you are ruled by the feet - so splurge on some great walking shoes!
sentences.cn: 记住: 步行对你是最有效的,那就赶紧多买几双旅游鞋吧!

sentences.en: Splurge on pretty padded hangers so clothes stay in store - bought shape.
sentences.cn: 多花些钱在漂亮的软垫衣架上,从而你的衣服就一直保持了商店里买来的形状.
